const response = await client.indices.create({
  index: "asciifold_example",
  settings: {
    analysis: {
      analyzer: {
        standard_asciifolding: {
          tokenizer: "standard",
          filter: ["my_ascii_folding"],
        },
      },
      filter: {
        my_ascii_folding: {
          type: "asciifolding",
          preserve_original: true,
        },
      },
    },
  },
});
console.log(response);
